oak_logs.name: oak_logs
oak_logs.description: A sturdy oak log, good for building and crafting.
oak_logs.examineText: A solid piece of oak wood. The bark is rough and the wood grain is clearly visible. This would make excellent building material or firewood.

water.name: water
water.description: Fresh water, essential for survival and cooking.
water.examineText: Clear, fresh water. You can drink this or use it for cooking.

flour.name: flour
flour.description: Ground grain flour, used for baking bread and other foods.
flour.examineText: Fine flour made from ground grain. Essential for baking.

stew.name: stew
stew.description: A hearty stew made from various ingredients.
stew.examineText: A delicious stew that smells wonderful. This will restore your energy.

bread.name: bread
bread.description: Freshly baked bread, a staple food.
bread.examineText: Warm, freshly baked bread. The crust is golden and the inside is soft.

magical_knowledge.name: magical_knowledge
magical_knowledge.description: Knowledge gained from studying the arcane arts.
magical_knowledge.examineText: A token representing your magical knowledge and understanding.

bandit_loot.name: bandit_loot
bandit_loot.description: Valuable items taken from defeated bandits.
bandit_loot.examineText: A collection of valuables taken from defeated bandits.

monster_parts.name: monster_parts
monster_parts.examineText: Various parts from defeated monsters. Some may be valuable for crafting.

masterwork_item.name: masterwork_item
masterwork_item.description: An exceptional item of legendary quality.
masterwork_item.examineText: A masterwork item of exceptional quality. This represents the pinnacle of craftsmanship.

exploration_knowledge.name: exploration_knowledge
exploration_knowledge.description: Knowledge gained from exploring the world.
exploration_knowledge.examineText: A token representing your knowledge of the world and its secrets.

combat_experience.name: combat_experience
combat_experience.examineText: A token representing your combat experience.

iron_sword.name: iron_sword
iron_sword.examineText: A sturdy sword forged from iron.

leather_armor.name: leather_armor
leather_armor.examineText: A set of armor crafted from tough leather.

enchanted_weapon.name: enchanted_weapon
enchanted_weapon.description: A weapon imbued with magical power.
enchanted_weapon.examineText: A weapon that glows with magical energy.

willow_logs.name: willow_logs
willow_logs.description: A log from a willow tree.
willow_logs.examineText: A flexible log from a willow tree.

maple_logs.name: maple_logs
maple_logs.description: A log from a maple tree.
maple_logs.examineText: A sturdy log from a maple tree.

yew_logs.name: yew_logs
yew_logs.description: A log from a yew tree.
yew_logs.examineText: A rare log from an ancient yew tree.

magic_logs.name: magic_logs
magic_logs.description: A log from a magical tree.
magic_logs.examineText: A log that shimmers with magical energy.

sardine.name: sardine
sardine.examineText: A silvery sardine, fresh from the water.

herring.name: herring
herring.description: A common fish found in rivers.
herring.examineText: A plump herring, ready to eat.

salmon.name: salmon
salmon.description: A prized fish known for its flavor.

shark.name: shark
shark.description: A dangerous predator from the sea.
shark.examineText: A fearsome shark, caught after a tough battle.

copper_ore.name: copper_ore
copper_ore.examineText: A chunk of copper ore, ready for smelting.

tin_ore.name: tin_ore
tin_ore.examineText: A chunk of tin ore, ready for smelting.

iron_ore.name: iron_ore
iron_ore.examineText: A chunk of iron ore, ready for smelting.

coal.name: coal
coal.description: A lump of coal, useful for smelting.

gold_ore.name: gold_ore
gold_ore.examineText: A chunk of gold ore, ready for smelting.

mithril_ore.name: mithril_ore
mithril_ore.examineText: A chunk of rare mithril ore.

adamantite_ore.name: adamantite_ore
adamantite_ore.examineText: A chunk of adamantite ore, extremely tough.

runite_ore.name: runite_ore
runite_ore.description: A legendary ore, rare and valuable.
runite_ore.examineText: A chunk of runite ore, legendary among smiths.
